text: Emily Lloyd (born 29 September 1970) is an English actress. She played Emily in Wish You Were Here. She played Samantha Hughes in In Country. She also played Cookie in the movie Cookie. She was born in London, England. Her father was Roger Lloyd-Pack. Her grandfather was Charles Lloyd-Pack. == References == Category:Actors from London Category:English movie actors Category:English television actors Category:1970 births Category:Living people
title: Emily Lloyd
